price: Naho Amajini (harimo na Shitani) tuyarema mbere (ya Adamu) tuyakomoye mu bishashi by’umuriro utagira umwotsi.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
